actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to establish an art bank in the Congress for the purpose of selecting American works of art for display in the House and Senate Office Buildings.

summary.text: Establishes an art bank in the Congress for the purpose of selecting American works of art for display in the House and Senate Office Buildings. Requires the board responsible for the administration of the art bank to compensate artists for loss, damage, or theft of such works of art. Prohibits any person from receiving compensation for the display of any work of art created by such person.

titles.title: A bill to establish an art bank in the Congress for the purpose of selecting American works of art for display in the House and Senate Office Buildings.
